content.text: Trial 2/5, Stage 'exit': Please describe the image and compute the stiffness matrix.

The image shows an L-shaped groove. The red circle indicates attention to one side of the groove.

### Stiffness Matrix
```json
{
  "stiffness_matrix": [
    [100, 0, 0],
    [0, 100, 0],
    [0, 0, 250]
  ]
}
```
